CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Direct Cost Savings"),ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c, "One-Time")), Hard_Savings__c, IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Direct Cost Savings"),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c, "One-Time"))), Annual_Recurring_Hard_Savings__c, IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Time Savings"),ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c, "One-Time")), Labor_Savings__c, IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Time Savings"),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c, "One-Time"))), Annual_Recurring_Labor_Savings__c + Labor_Savings__c, 0))))
CustomField.label: Total Savings
